name: Banette
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

ancient_trait.name: Δ  Evolution
ancient_trait.effect: You may play this card from your hand to evolve a Pokémon during your first turn or the turn you play that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Evolution Jammer
attacks.effect: Your opponent can’t play any Pokémon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Pokémon during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Curse Deeply
attacks.effect: Put 5 damage counters on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
